settings.heading: What is IRIS?
settings.row_content:
RIS is a collection of 10,000 physical artworks.
Each piece contains an individual eye artwork, 0.4 g of real gold, and an embedded NFC chip.

Each artwork is unique.

settings.heading: Do I choose my artwork?
settings.row_content:
No.

When purchasing an IRIS, you do not select a specific piece.
The artwork remains unrevealed until activation.

settings.heading: When is the artwork revealed?
settings.row_content:
The artwork reveals itself only after:

  1. Physical delivery
  2. NFC activation

Activation is required to view your specific artwork and its rarity.

settings.heading: What is NFC activation?
settings.row_content:
Each IRIS contains an embedded NFC chip. After receiving your artwork, you scan the chip with your phone. You will be directed to the activation page.

Once activated:

  • Ownership is registered
  • The artwork is revealed
  • The digital passport becomes accessible

Activation is irreversible.

settings.heading: What is the digital passport?
settings.row_content:
The digital passport is a permanent record of the artwork.

It includes:

  • Artwork ID
  • Rarity
  • Activation date
  • Ownership history

The passport records facts.
It does not assign value.

settings.heading: How is rarity determined?
settings.row_content:
Rarity is assigned before any artwork is sold.

The structure of the collection consists of:

  • 5,000 black impressions
  • 3,000 color impressions on white paper
  • 1,500 white impressions on black paper
  • 400 color impressions on colored paper
  • 100 original works

Rarity cannot be modified after release.

settings.heading: Can rarity be changed?
settings.row_content:
No.

Rarity is locked before distribution and cannot be adjusted afterward.

settings.heading: Is IRIS an NFT?
settings.row_content:
No.

IRIS is a physical artwork.
Ownership is established through NFC activation, not blockchain tokens.

No cryptocurrency or digital wallet is required.

settings.heading: Can I transfer ownership?
settings.row_content:
Ownership transfer functionality may be introduced in the future.

Currently, ownership is recorded upon activation and remains tied to the activated account.

settings.heading: What happens if I do not activate my IRIS?
settings.row_content:
Until activation:

  • The artwork remains unrevealed
  • Ownership is not registered

Activation is required to complete the ownership process.

settings.heading: Is the gold symbolic?
settings.row_content:
No.

Each IRIS physically contains 0.4 grams of 24k gold embedded within the artwork.

The gold is a material element of the piece.
